call_to_action.title: Connect with arjit !
call_to_action.description: Got a cool idea? Need a hand on a project? Or just want to talk tech? I’m always open to conversations.

params.footer_description: From fundamentals to fullstack development — A structured journey through computer science.

metadata.meta_description: Level up your tech skills with CSPrimer! Follow a full-stack developer's journey in system design, core computer science, and practical problem-solving. Start learning to code and build from the ground up.
